description: This file is a React component for handling the OAuth callback flow for Jira integration. It manages the OCR authorization result, displays success/error messages, and redirects accordingly.

methods.name: JiraOAuthCallbackPage
methods.description: Main component that wraps the OAuth callback handling inside a Suspense boundary.

methods.name: JiraOAuthCallbackInner
methods.description: Handles the OAuth callback logic, displays status messages, and redirects based on the OAuth result.
